phrases: Where did she run off to?
I have got nothing to do, and I am broke after going shopping yesterday.
Maybe I will just go to Taihei's place...
These custard cakes sure are yummy!
And there are still plenty more left!
No, I do not know why, but these were just lying around the house.
Dude, it is REALLY cold out here.
Hurry up and let me in!
Those are the custard cakes I bought yesterday!
I was looking forward to eating those tonight...
So she basically thieved them, huh?
This has gotten sort of awkward, has not it?
Even though they are brother and sister, yeah...
You are always coming here to hang out, are not you?
It is good that you have not just been staying home alone.
I am glad that you have made a good friend.
And thanks for those custard cakes, Bomba!
Well, I bought them for Kirie anyway.
Let me get you some cola to say thanks!
I mean, she looks like a tanuki, right?
You call my Master a TANUKI?!
If you see my Master's cuteness and think that she is a tanuki, something is wrong with you!
Well, they look sort of the same, do not they?
If anything, it is weird that you call her Master.
What makes you think you have to worry about the friends I keep?!
I had a good time when we were at the beach, without you being around.
You did not even pay any attention to me...
Why would you not pay attention to your own sister?!
Just die, you idiot of a brother!
Looks like Bomba's already done for.
Let us relax and have some cola.
Yeah, they are related all right.
Hey, how about the four of us play a game?
What do you say we play on the same team, Kirie?
I am not teaming up with YOU!
Umaru, I am going to the Nyaon Mall to buy groceries for dinner.
It is got all the latest!
I would not want it to get wet.
Going by this weather, it is not going to rain.
I need to go over today's route!
The groceries will get heavy, and there is also the problem of keeping them fresh...
I will do the bookstore first.
I will wrap up my purchases at the 3rd-floor bookstore by 1:30.
After that, I will hurry down to the 1st-floor ATM.
I will take note of the crowds and act accordingly,
making a careful selection of requisite ingredients.
The weather will likely make a turn for the worst between 3:00 pm and 4:00 pm.
So, I will finish up my purchases and get home before then.
Still, this is the same route as always, with the exception of the bookstore.
This is the first time I have come to the 3rd floor.
Where do they keep the Fanitsu?
No, it would not be with the storybooks...
No, it would not be with the storybooks...
Maybe that was a bad time to try to talk to her again...
The same thing happened last time too.
It is not going to rain!
It is freaking pouring down, Umaru...
Looks like you do not have an umbrella ei...
Come to think of it, she seems to get a little down on rainy days.
I came to the bookstore to do a bit of research, but I...
you always made the best grades in school, did not you?
But I am nowhere near as good as you.
There is no way I could make my dream come...
You do not want to hear about any of this, do you?
No, that is not true at all.
I think you are pretty great, Kirie.
True, all I did in high school was study...
But I never thought about what I would do in the future.
I just stuck to the route that was right in front of me.
I guess it is still sort of the same.
I-I... want to be a storybook author.
I am writing a book about my Master.
M-meeting her has made me so happy, and has given me courage.
That is why, I want to share that with people everywhere!
To tell people about my Master, through storybooks!
You would be the only one who could do that huh, Kirie?
I told you that you would not need an umbrella...
And I am glad you brought one for Kirie.
I was just thinking, it is nice to take a different route sometimes.
We are going down the same street as always.
That is not what I mean.
I was so concerned about Kirie that I forgot all about it...
We have used various means to make yourself more appealing to Taihei, but it is gotten you nowhere.
H-have we really used that many...?
But now, I have devised a plan that will bring you two together!
Kirie, you seem way more fired up than usual...
Did your skate shoes fit okay?
Hey, Umaru, it looks like some pros have come to practice today.
Things could get kind of dangerous.
They separate the pros and the amateurs.
But it is not like it is walled off or anything, right?
I am telling you, it will be okay!
P-please, I will be counting on you today!
Yes, simple because and effect: The thrill of skating practice will lead to the thrill of love!
Through teaching Ebina how to skate, those two will...!
And as their relationship progresses, Umaru and I will...!
It is... it is so perfect, it is almost frightening!
This is my first time at a Japanese skating rink.
She was the only one not invited, and yet...
When people skate on their own, well...
This is going to lead to something!
The pros are skating over here too!
Looks like it would be best to stay in the middle area.
You are not going to skate?
I would just assumed that he could!
H-how did this because and effect lead to me and Ebina getting together?
The only thing to do is teach him how to skate, and fast!
That way, the two of them will...
What kind of move was that?!
Just let the strength go out of your body.
Putting too much strength into your feet will make you lose your balance!
But, this could be bad not just for me but other people here.
Y-you will be fine if you just relax and skate.
You will be fine if you think of it merely as a surface you are sliding upon.
That was as beautiful as a pro figure skater!
Goodness, you are making me blush!
She is just set a new world record!
Umaru, your jump is far more beautiful!
The strength is draining from my body...
Brother, you are going into the pro area?!
I would like to go again, indeed!
Thank you for inviting me to go skating, Kirie!
This did not help improve things for you at all...
It is cold outside, so it is good to have something hot.
This is much tastier than what my big sister made!
I am going to to buy something.
You should not eat that, Hikari.
I saw her in action once...
It is just, when it comes to cooking...
Oh, there is no more bread.
Please make dinner at our house!
Big Brother, we need more bread!
Please make dinner at our house!
You have eaten it all already?
I will have to heat it up, so hold on a minute.
Did you say something just now?
It is gotten pretty dark outside, huh?
It sure gets dark soon in the winter.
I suppose I should get going.
I thought I would take a look outside.
The stars are out and they are so pretty!
You can really see them tonight.
Do you want to have a look too, Hikari?
Which one's Altair and which one's Deneb again?
I have told you twice already.
It was YOU I taught about the stars.
When I was young, I always just stayed at home.
In those days, my sis was like...
You are eating sweet bread AGAIN?!
Eating only bread is not healthy at all!
And here I was thinking you would be lonely at home by yourself and got you a present...
It is a stuffed toy cat.
Wh-why would not it be cute?
My sister is a little strange.
THIS is the sort of thing she likes?
Th-this is my little sister, Hikari.
You would mentioned you had a sister.
She looks just like MY little sister.
It is nice to meet you, Hikari.
Here is that recipe book, the one you said you wanted.
What are the odds you would have this very same book?
My way of thanking you for that stuffed doll!
I looked around, but just could not seem to find this book.
I cannot believe you had it.
Well, I do not want to inconvenience you by staying too long.
Please have some of my sister's cooking!
I never knew your sister was good in the kitchen.
Looks like this will take a little while...
You can really see them, huh?
Well, how about I teach you the constellations' names to pass the time?
The stars are lined up in a W shape, see?
My sister is strange... and she brought home a strange guy.
The stars are lined up in a W shape, see?
My sister is strange... and she brought home a strange guy.
I have missed you so much!
How long are you going to keep this up?!
With the both of you on me, I cannot really move...
I have my own technique, the Hikari Dive!
First thing's first: Get off of him!
I guess this is what a mother feels like...
Yes, I have got someone coming for me.
This will be the last episode, huh everyone?
Looking back, it is gone by so fast.
Indeed, it feels like a mere three months have passed!
It is a little sad, is not it?
Okay, let us finish this out, everyone.
